tool_description:
Tamil Dictionary API.  Access agarathi.com tamil dictionary functionality in an easy to use REST API form.  The following dictionaries are available.

"University of Madras Lexicon",
"J.P.Fabricius Tamil and English Dictionary",
"Miron Winslow - A Comprehensive Tamil and English Dictionary",
"David McAlpin - A Core vocabulary for Tamil",
"தமிழ் தமிழ் அகரமுதலி",
"agarathi.com dictionary"
name: Tamil Dictionary
title: Tamil Dictionary

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search a word in agarathi.com dictionaries

optional_parameters.name: dictionary
optional_parameters.description: Dictionary to search the word in. Default is all.

api_list.name: list dictionaries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tamil.p.rapidapi.com/dictionary/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tamil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Word of the day
api_list.description: Get Tamil word of the day
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tamil.p.rapidapi.com/dictionary/wod"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tamil.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
